ethos.heading: e t h o s
ethos.desc1: Understated chic is our design ethos and subtle details are our raison d'être. We ensure everything about your stay is immaculate, from the pillowy white cotton sheets dressing your bed to the thoughtfully-placed garden-grown herb garnishes on your plate.
ethos.desc2: Clean lines and lashings of white underscore the rich tones of nature's palette. An airy refuge, our boutique hotel is a place where guests can rediscover the forgotten rhythms of long, drawn-out days and easy, lingering evenings.

dining.heading: t a s t e
dining.description: Fine dining, Amalfi style. At Casa Angelina, the rich flavors and ingredients of Campania inspire every dish.

unPiano.name: Un Piano Nel Cielo
unPiano.tagline: Campania-inspired cuisine paired with spectacular sea views

breakfast.name: Breakfast
breakfast.tagline: Mediterranean mornings start with a full-spread breakfast

experiences.heading: e x p e r i e n c e s

chefOnBoard.title: Chef on Board
chefOnBoard.subtitle: Amalfi Flavors, At Sea Level
chefOnBoard.description: An enjoyable and delicious experience, full of taste and adventure. An unusual way to enjoy authentic Neapolitan cuisine.

fineDriving.title: Fine Driving
fineDriving.subtitle: A Dose of Retro Magic
fineDriving.description: Few places in Italy exemplify la dolce vita quite like the Amalfi Coast. Experience it in vintage style.

romanceRetreat.title: Romance Retreat
romanceRetreat.subtitle: A Starry-Eyed Weekend Stay
romanceRetreat.description: With our dreamy cliff-side setting and pared-back, sophisticated style, Casa Angelina is the ultimate romantic getaway.

bodySoul.title: Body & Soul
bodySoul.subtitle: Getting Back to Your Best Self
bodySoul.description: Decompress with this three-night wellness package, all about making you feel fit, healthy and stress-free.

location.subtitle: an oasis of peace and quiet
